item.description:
You need to contact the Hu Ke Lau and purchase your tickets.
Say you are part of the Single Mingle Meetup group, so we can all sit together.

Event/Band Name: Christopher Titus (Must be 21 and over)
Price: $25.00
Description: Christopher Titus star of the hit ABC show "BIG SHOTS"

Doors open at 5:30 PM / Show starts at 7:00 PM
Ticket Price: $25.00 Cash / $30.00 Credit or Debit
Tickets are nonrefundable
MUST 21 AND OVER TO ATTEND. VALID ID IS REQUIRED

ANY PARTY 5 OR LESS WILL BE SHARING A TABLE
ALL COMEDY SHOWS ARE SHARED SEATING, OTHER PEOPLE MAY BE SEATED AT YOUR TABLE
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the Single Mingle Meetup group table T1 But you have to reserve by the 15th ! I have 6-8 seat reserved (2 are taken) So after the 15th the seats will be gone - so hurry.
item.why: He's real funny - and since we are in front - we will get picked on - Yeah!!
item.name: Christopher Titus
